Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8ZMo.name: z_roundCorners(_:radius:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8ZMo.abstract: Apply radius rounded corner to the desired corners.

Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.name: setTopViewBackgroundColor(toColor:)
Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.abstract: Set the color of the top draggable view.

Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.name: forceReload()
Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.abstract: Use this to force a reload of the subViewController and adapt the containerView to the new height (animated).

Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.name: expandToFitScreen(withDuration:)
Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.abstract: Set constraintBottom as the sum of all visible view heights.

Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.name: getAvailableSpace()
Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.abstract: Returns the space between the top of the current popup view and the height of this view controller.

Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.name: setOffScreenColor(_:)
Classes/ZModalViewController.html#/s:8ZM.abstract: Set the background color of the view anchored to the bottom of the containerView.

Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.name: modalParentViewController
Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.abstract: The ZModalViewController who this view controller belong to

Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.name: getBackgroundColor()
Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.abstract: Returns the color that the ZModalViewController will use to paint the extra view in the bottom of the screen.

Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.name: getTopLineColor()
Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.abstract: By default is nil. If different, it will override the color of the line inside the TopBarView

Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.name: dismiss(animated:)
Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html#/.abstract: If this ViewController has an ZModalViewController it will call the parent.dismiss.

Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html.name: ZModalChildViewController
Classes/ZModalChildViewController.html.abstract: A ViewController that must be presented inside an ZModalViewController.

Classes/ZModalViewController.html.name: ZModalViewController
Classes/ZModalViewController.html.abstract: This is a View Controller that comes from bottom and has vertical swipe gesture to handle the dismiss (animated).
